Sheet1.Title: description
Sheet1.Photographs: Passport size photographs of the applicant and co-applicant (if any).
Sheet1.Identity Proof:
Any one of the following:
Passport
Aadhaar 
Voter ID 
Driving license
Sheet1.Guarantor Form: If required, duly filled and signed.
Sheet1.Academic Records:
Mark sheets and certificates of qualifying exams.
Admission letter.
Sheet1.Income Proof:
For salaried individuals: Salary slips of the last 3 months, Form 16, and/or Income Tax Returns (ITR)
For self-employed individuals: ITR, Profit & Loss account, Balance Sheet, and/or Business Proof
Sheet1.Property Documents: If applicable as collateral, documents related to the property being pledged.
Sheet1.Residence Proof:
Any one of the following:
Passport
Aadhaar 
Voter ID 
Driving license
